LanguageData.RT_UH60_Vehicle.label: UH60 Black Hawk
LanguageData.RT_UH60_Vehicle.description:
A twin-engine, medium-lift utility helicopter, with considerable speed, combining cargo and passenger transport.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x2, Passenger x8
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
